text:
A Comical Encounter

Raskolnikov and Porfiry on the stairs, tension in the air.  
Raskolnikov: “Your office is such a comical one.”  

Porfiry pauses, intrigued.  
Porfiry: “Why comical?”  
Raskolnikov: “You tortured Nikolay till he confessed!”  

---  

Raskolnikov smirks, playful banter continues.  
Raskolnikov: “You’ll vivisect him again, right?”  
Porfiry: “He-he! You noticed that?”  

Raskolnikov walks home, deep in thought.  
Raskolnikov: “What a muddled situation…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reflects on the psychological manipulation involved in Nikolay's confession, finding humor in the absurdity of the situation.
